original_title: Ang mga Alingawngaw sa Panahon ng Pagpapasya
overview: Amidst the social and political struggles of the "Bagong Lipunan" era, Red grows up with his middle-class family as an ordinary boy. He then finds himself caught between the conflicts brought by his mother's unbending ideologies, and his father's apolitical instinct to protect his family.
title: Echoes in the Midst of Indecision
